mapper.insert: insert into member_table(member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_email, member_tel, member_birth, member_create_date) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberTel}, #{memberBirth}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT resv.*, ht.hotel_name, (CASE WHEN (resv.reservation_hotel_num=1 OR resv.reservation_hotel_num=16) THEN (SELECT hr.room_code FROM hotel_room_table AS hr WHERE hr.room_code = resv.reservation_room_code) ELSE (SELECT sr.room_code FROM stay_room_table AS sr WHERE sr.room_code = resv.reservation_room_code) END) AS room_code FROM reservation_table AS resv JOIN hotel_table AS ht ON ht.hotel_num = resv.reservation_hotel_num WHERE reservation_customer_id=#{customerId} ORDER BY reservation_date DESC

SELECT ct.customer_id, ct.customer_name, ct.customer_earned_points, ct.customer_used_points, resv.reservation_date, resv.reservation_num FROM customer_table AS ct JOIN reservation_table AS resv ON resv.reservation_num = ct.customer_reservation_num WHERE customer_id=#{customerId} ORDER BY resv.reservation_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_table(inquiry_category, inquiry_hotel_name, inquiry_reservation_num, inquiry_title, inquiry_contents, inquiry_user_name, inquiry_user_email, inquiry_user_tel, inquiry_create_date, inquiry_password, inquiry_hidden) VALUES (#{inquiryCategory}, #{inquiryHotelName}, #{inquiryReservationNum}, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContents}, #{inquiryUserName}, #{inquiryUserEmail}, #{inquiryUserTel}, NOW(), #{inquiryPassword}, #{inquiryHidden});
mapper.select: SELECT resv.*, ht.hotel_name, (CASE WHEN (resv.reservation_hotel_num=1 OR resv.reservation_hotel_num=16) THEN (SELECT hr.room_code FROM hotel_room_table AS hr WHERE hr.room_code = resv.reservation_room_code) ELSE (SELECT sr.room_code FROM stay_room_table AS sr WHERE sr.room_code = resv.reservation_room_code) END) AS room_code FROM reservation_table AS resv JOIN hotel_table AS ht ON ht.hotel_num = resv.reservation_hotel_num WHERE reservation_num = #{reservationNum} AND reservation_customer_name=#{customerName} ORDER BY reservation_date DESC
